channel.title: Reference on Scratch Addons
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on Scratch Addons

item.title: Addon Manifest
item.description: Some parts of this documentation may be missing or outdated. You can help improving this page. Do not hesitate to ask questions regarding this by using the provided channels. Addons are located inside the addons folder. Each addon is inside its own folder as well. In order to tell the addon loader how the addon plans to work, addons use a standard addon.json file located at the root of the addon’s folder.

item.title: Design
item.description: Icons We use iconify UIL (Unicons) icons. See them at https://iconify.design/icon-sets/uil/. Please only use icons from this set unless you have explicit permission to use another set. When adding an icon, download it to /images/icons/iconname.svg. Colors Our color theme is orange #ff7b26 and white #fff. These colors make up the top bar on our webpages, as well as some other elements. For our (default) dark theme, our main colors are #2a2a2a #222 #000.
